## **Hierarchical Clustering**

---


```{r s1, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, comment=NA}

library(cluster)

## Standardize the mtcars dataset by creating a standardized distance matrix
cars.dist = dist(scale(mtcars))

## Cluster model
mdl = hclust(cars.dist)
plot(mdl)

```
